com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.line

Class StaticLearningRate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.line.StaticLearningRate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineSearchStrategy

    public class StaticLearningRate
extends Object
implements LineSearchStrategy
    A very basic line search which uses a static rate, searching lower rates when iterations do not result in improvement.
